org.parosproxy.paros.extension

Interface SessionChangedListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ExtensionActiveScan, ExtensionAlert, ExtensionAntiCSRF, ExtensionAPI, ExtensionBreak, ExtensionCompare, ExtensionFuzz, ExtensionFuzz, ExtensionHistory, ExtensionHttpSessions, ExtensionManualRequestEditor, ExtensionParams, ExtensionPassiveScan, ExtensionReauth, ExtensionSearch, ExtensionSpider, ExtensionState, ExtensionUiUtils, PassiveScanThread

    public interface SessionChangedListener

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void sessionAboutToChange(Session session)
      Called just prior to the session changing.
      void sessionChanged(Session session)
      Called just after the session has changed.
      void sessionModeChanged(Control.Mode mode)
      Called when the user changes the mode.
      void sessionScopeChanged(Session session)
      Called when the user has changes the session scope.

    • Method Detail

      • sessionChanged

        void sessionChanged(Session session)
        Called just after the session has changed. sessionChanged may be called by non-event thread. Should handle with care in all the listener. Use EventThread for each GUI event.
        Parameters:
        session -

      • sessionAboutToChange

        void sessionAboutToChange(Session session)
        Called just prior to the session changing. Listeners should close down any resources associaited with this session. sessionAboutToChange may be called by non-event thread. Should handle with care in all the listener. Use EventThread for each GUI event.
        Parameters:
        session -

      • sessionScopeChanged

        void sessionScopeChanged(Session session)
        Called when the user has changes the session scope. sessionScopeChanged may be called by non-event thread. Should handle with care in all the listener. Use EventThread for each GUI event.
        Parameters:
        session -

      • sessionModeChanged

        void sessionModeChanged(Control.Mode mode)
        Called when the user changes the mode. sessionModeChanged may be called by non-event thread. Should handle with care in all the listener. Use EventThread for each GUI event.
        Parameters:
        mode -
